name: Hintsa Performance
description: Provider of coaching services intended to aid athletes and business professionals to achieve sustainable success. The company guides individuals, teams, and organizations to enjoy a better life and improve their performance in challenging business and sports environments, enabling clients to live stress-free lives while committing completely to their work.
